key_risks: Legacy liabilities from pre-financial crisis activities, particularly exposure to risky mortgage-backed securities (RMBS)
Heavy regulatory oversight and dependence on regulatory approvals
Intense competition in the financial guarantee industry
Reputation and investor confidence issues due to past bankruptcy and financial crisis involvement
controversies: $995 million settlement with JP Morgan related to RMBS disputes
$33 million in securities class action settlements in 2011
Pending Wisconsin OCI approval for a $50 million stock repurchase program
environmental_issues: Exposure to environmental risks as part of ESG considerations
social_issues: Reputational challenges affecting social perception and investor confidence
governance_issues: Regulatory dependencies and delays in approvals
Significant legal and advisory expenses related to acquisitions and settlements

sources.title: Ambac - Wikipedia
sources.snippet: The Ambac Financial Group, Inc., generally known as Ambac (originally the American Municipal Bond Assurance Corporation), is an American holding company.Its subsidiaries provide financial guarantee products such as bond insurance to clients in both the public and private sectors globally.
